import { Component, ViewChild, ElementRef, ComponentRef, AfterViewInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { GridSquaresComponent } from '../grid-squares/grid-squares.component'; import { SquareData } from '../square-data'; @Component({ selector: 'app-game-grid', templateUrl: './game-grid.component.html', styleUrls: ['./game-grid.component.css'] }) export class GameGridComponent { title = 'Minefield' @Input() mines: number = 7; colArray: number[] = []; rowArray: number[] = []; squares: SquareData[] = []; columns = 5; rows = 10; ngOnInit() { this.setDimension(); } //// Generate grid and randomise bomb locations setDimension() { this.squares = []; let totalSquares = this.rows * this.columns; for (let i = 0; i < totalSquares; i++) { if (i < this.mines) { const squareData: SquareData = { mine: true, state: 'hidden' }; this.squares.push(squareData); } else { const squareData: SquareData = { mine: false, state: 'hidden' }; this.squares.push(squareData); } } this.squares.sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5); let index = 0; this.squares.forEach(() => { let adjacentSquares: number[] = []; if ((index % this.columns) - 1 >= 0) { adjacentSquares.push(index - 1) }; // left if ((index % this.columns) + 1 < this.columns) { adjacentSquares.push(index + 1) }; // right if (index - this.columns >= 0) { adjacentSquares.push(index - this.columns) }; // top if (index + this.columns < totalSquares) { adjacentSquares.push(index + this.columns) }; // bottom if ((index - this.columns) - 1 >= 0 && (index % this.columns) - 1 >= 0) { adjacentSquares.push(index - this.columns - 1) }; // top left if ((index - this.columns) - 1 >= 0 && (index % this.columns) + 1 < this.columns) { adjacentSquares.push(index - this.columns + 1) }; // top right if ((index + this.columns) - 1 < totalSquares && (index % this.columns) - 1 >= 0) { adjacentSquares.push(index + this.columns - 1) }; // bottom left?? if ((index + this.columns) + 1 < totalSquares && (index % this.columns) + 1 < this.columns) { adjacentSquares.push(index + this.columns + 1) }; this.squares[index].adjacent = adjacentSquares; index++; }) } //// Event emitted from square, check for adjacent mines, if none repeat for adjacent squares squareClicked(index: number) { let square = this.squares[index]; let adjacentMines = 0; square.adjacent?.forEach((index: number) => { if (this.checkForMine(index)) { adjacentMines++; } }) square = { state: 'revealed', mine: square.mine, adjacentMines: adjacentMines, adjacent: square.adjacent }; this.squares[index] = square; if (adjacentMines == 0) { square.adjacent ?.forEach((check: number) => { if (this.squares[check].state == 'hidden') { this.squareClicked(check); } }) } } //// Checks if a square is a mine checkForMine(index: number) { let square = this.squares[index]; if (square.mine) { return true; } else { return false; } } }
